Description:

Develop a systematic approach to plan an efficient hiring schedule for the prescribed profiles.

Work with concerned managements to develop accurate job profile descriptions as per requirements.
Prepare recruitment materials and post jobs to appropriate job board.Skills

Demonstrated ability to brainstorm ideas with the in-house team through fluent meetings and discussions.
Strong analytical thinking and problem solving skills;
Skilled professional with a sound understanding of recruitment timelines and onboarding process.
Experienced end-to-end recruiter with sound command over conventional and digital hiring techniques.

Professional education in Human Resource Management or subsequent domain. (Minimum Bachelor's degree preferred)
